Methods

(inner) insert(document, options, resultCallback)

This is insert method of mongodb
Parameters:
Name Type Description
document object object ot mongodb, a document
options json options this is option parameter, the function will set it to default options if it is null.
resultCallback , this is an option parameter
Source:
  • mongodb/mongodb.js, line 79
Returns:
resultCallback callback function
